meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shadowy.
meanings.sent1: The shadowiness of the forest made it seem mysterious and dark.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with shadowiness as the sun set outside.
meanings.sent3: The shadowiness of the cave made it a perfect hiding spot for the treasure.
meanings.sent4: The shadowiness of the alley gave it an eerie and foreboding atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The shadowiness of the painting added depth and intrigue to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The shadowiness of the trees created a cool spot to escape the sun.
meanings.sent2: The shadowiness of the figure in the dark alley made it hard to identify.
meanings.sent3: The shadowiness of the cat's tail made it look like a mysterious creature.
meanings.sent4: The shadowiness of the clouds cast a gloomy mood over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The shadowiness of the room made it feel cozy and intimate.
